thread.title: Brexit cost is lower than ever, says Boris
thread.title_full: Brexit cost is lower than ever, says Boris

title: Brexit cost is lower than ever, says Boris
text:
Hate crimes against Muslims to be recorded Published 58 minutes ago 
Hate crimes directed at people because of their Muslim faith are to be recorded separately in line with antisemitic offences, David Cameron is to announce Civil service: a snake pit that rejects outsiders Published 58 minutes ago 
The civil service is like a club you cannot join — a little like Marylebone Cricket Club — that rejects external recruits and fresh thinking, an official report says Anyone for a brew of lukewarm European ingredients? Published 58 minutes ago 
Your organising skills had better be tip-top if you’re going to launch your campaign in a warehouse with the faint whiff of yeast in the air Secret talks on migrant tax Published 58 minutes ago 
Secret talks have been held on a European “solidarity tax” to pay for the refugee crisis in a blow to David Cameron’s attempts to limit EU spending Find
